availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael S. Gross (Louisville, Kentucky, street brake)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, street brake. Pennsylvania native. Married to Evelina Newman Gross on March 31,1847, in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Father of Michael S. Gross, George S. Gross, Nathan Gross, Mary E. Gross. Printer in Louisville in 1850. Street brake in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 3, p. 332B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 6, p. 385.
Find A Grave, "Michael S. Gross (Jan. 8, 1798-July 27, 1865)," Memorial #156966847, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/156966847 (accessed March 18, 2020).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707, p.149.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000818484, p. 230.
